column5: Are there any walleye, perch or other to be had in Presquile Bay through Hard water?  What about bait shops in the area?  If not, I guess its off to Quinty.  thanks!  - James

There are plenty of pike and walleye in presquile/Brighton bay.  There were about 20 or 30 huts out on the ice this afternoon off the shore near Gosport.  I spoke to a guy there who said the fishing was okay at the moment but not spectacular.   The ice is about 9 inches thick at the moment.  Im not sure where there is to get any bait near Brighton, (I assume that you mean minnows) I will try and find out tomorrow and let you know.  I hope to get out for a few ours tomorrow night after work.
Theres a guy that sells minnows about 5kms east of Brighton on Cty Rd 2, its on the north side opposite an unused motel, round about # 16530.  They are 4$ a dozen.
